description: This fluffy pancake recipe has Greek-style yoghurt, sugar-free maple syrup, fresh berries and crunchy pistachios - try it for your next brekkie.
name: Fluffy Raspberry & Yoghurt Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine strawberries, blueberries and remaining raspberries in a small bowl. Place 2 pancakes on each plate and top with remaining yoghurt. Scatter with berries and pistachios and drizzle with remaining syrup.
